changeSet.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "users"; CREATE TABLE "public"."users" ( "id" bigint DEFAULT nextval('user_id_seq') NOT NULL, "name" character varying(255), "surname" character varying(255), "passport_series" character varying(255), "passport_number" character varying(255), CONSTRAINT "user_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"), CONSTRAINT "person_passport_series_passport_number_key" UNIQUE ("passport_series", "passport_number") ) WITH (oids = false);
